players.name: Rohit Sharma
players.desc: Right-handed opening batsman and captain of the Indian cricket team.

players.name: Virat Kohli
players.desc: Right-handed top-order batsman, former captain.

players.name: Shreyas Iyer
players.desc: Right-handed middle-order batsman. Strong player of spin bowling and known for accelerating the innings in middle overs.

players.name: Hardik Pandya
players.desc: Useful seam bowling all-rounder.

players.name: Ravindra Jadeja
players.desc: Left-handed batsman and slow left-arm orthodox bowler.

players.name: Ravichandran Ashwin
players.desc: Right-handed batsman and right-arm off-break bowler. Crafty spinner with variations and useful lower-order batting.

players.name: Jasprit Bumrah
players.desc: Right-arm fast bowler. Known for his unorthodox action, deadly yorkers, and ability to bowl in any phase of the game.

players.name: Mohammed Shami
players.desc: Right-arm fast bowler. Known for his seam position and ability to swing the ball both ways. Deadly in helpful conditions.

players.name: Kuldeep Yadhav
players.desc: Left-arm wrist spinner. Known for his variations and ability to take wickets in the middle overs. Difficult to read for batsmen.

players.name: KL Rahul
players.desc: Right-handed batsman and wicket-keeper. Known for his versatility in batting order and safe hands behind the stumps.

players.name: Mohammed Siraj
players.desc: Right-arm fast bowler. Has improved significantly in recent years with ability to swing the ball at good pace.

players.name: India Bowler 5
players.desc: Spin bowling reserve.

players.name: India Allrounder 3
players.desc: Batting all-rounder.

players.name: India Keeper 2
players.desc: Reserve wicketkeeper.

players.name: India Bowler 6
players.desc: Extra pace option.

players.name: Usman Khawaja
players.desc: A calm and technically sound opener known for his consistency and ability to anchor long innings in tough conditions.

players.name: Marnus Labuschagne
players.desc: Dependable No. 3 batsman combining solid defense and patience, often building crucial partnerships for Australia.

players.name: Steve Smith
players.desc: One of the best batsmen in world cricket, known for his unorthodox technique and match-saving performances under pressure.

players.name: Travis Head
players.desc: Aggressive left-hander who can counterattack and shift momentum with quick scoring in the middle order.

players.name: Cameron Green
players.desc: A tall seam-bowling all-rounder offering balance with both bat and ball; contributes key runs and tight spells.

players.name: Beau Webster
players.desc: Versatile all-rounder capable of batting in the middle order and bowling medium pace, adding depth and flexibility.

players.name: Pat Cummins
players.desc: Captain and premier fast bowler; combines express pace with accuracy and intelligent leadership on the field.

players.name: Mitchell Starc
players.desc: Left-arm pacer known for his lethal swinging yorkers and knack for striking early with the new ball.

players.name: Josh Hazlewood
players.desc: Right-arm quick known for immaculate line and length, providing reliability and control in long spells.

players.name: Nathan Lyon
players.desc: Experienced off-spinner famous for his control, bounce, and ability to turn matches with his skill on any surface.

players.name: Alex Carey
players.desc: Reliable wicketkeeper-batsman with tidy glovework and the ability to stabilize or accelerate lower-order innings.

players.name: Matthew Renshaw
players.desc: Reserve top-order batsman providing backup as an opener.

players.name: Scott Boland
players.desc: Accurate seamer who provides consistency and control as a backup pacer.

players.name: Aaron Hardie
players.desc: Batting all-rounder capable of contributing quick runs and handy overs.

players.name: Josh Inglis
players.desc: Backup wicketkeeper and aggressive lower-order batsman.

players.name: Lance Morris
players.desc: Extra pace option with raw speed and bounce, waiting for opportunity.
